text: Don Juan Antonio Samaranch y Torelló, 1st Marquis of Samaranch (17 July 1920 – 21 April 2010) was a Spanish sports administrator. He served as the seventh President of the International Olympic Committee (IOC) from 1980 to 2001.Obituary The Times, 22 April 2010.Obituary The Guardian, 22 April 2010.Juan Antonio Samaranch – The Independent Obituary – 22 April 2010 (By Martin Childs) Samaranch died of cardio-respiratory failure on 21 April 2010, aged 89.. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Presidents of the International Olympic Committee Category:Spanish politicians Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:Sports executives and administrators
title: Juan Antonio Samaranch
